title: Ping goes high in team fights or skirmishes (sort of)
body:
I use wifi connection and sometimes my ping jumps high for like 1-2 seconds for some reason (I noticed that it occurs more in duels or skirmishes). It doesn't happen all the time. Like there are days when it doesn't lag at all. 
Maybe it's the router or something I dont know but I just wanted to post here incase it's something to do with the bad wifi bandwidth or game itself.

replies.body: I got it. I switched wifi channels and it fixed the problem.

I've had low to high pings all day.
Ran the log reader Porocles mentioned, it seems whenever I start having high latency there is 0.5% to 2.5% packet loss.
My latency has been ranging from 80ms(good) to 200-1000ms (bad...)

Any advice? yesterday I had no issues at all.

Same thing happen to me. The thing is only on league I got this problem. I play more moba games and shooter/rpg games and I have no problems with the internet. Even here, the game runs prefectly till someone engage on u or a team fight is going on, boom 200 lag and the game freeze for like 2-3 seconds or even more. Is literally unplayable...
Before the update, I didn't had any problem.. after the update to the new patch, unplayable... :|

You could be experiencing packet loss which can be caused by wifi or a network problem, so you can see sudden input delays.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what's going on.  Let me know what you find!
